text: 11.4 Gal 1.7-9 Yad nepin, bɨ ogɨnap, kɨli Jisas chɨn ak nop takaw agñɨbun ak ma apal, Jisas olap ke tek takaw ak agñɨbal. Takaw agñɨbal anɨb ak, nɨbi nɨgɨnɨg mɨdebɨm. Pen God Kawnan ak ned dɨpɨm ak mel, kawnan olap ke tek dɨnɨg mɨdebɨm. Pen takaw teplep ak ned gos nepɨm ak mel, takaw teplep olap ke tek gos nɨgɨnɨg mɨdebɨm. Bɨ anɨb okok takaw kɨli pel nepɨm ak nɨm, takaw yad ak abe nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
